testsuite.name: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: When I choose "Maple-graded" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And I set question fields: '{"responseType":"maple","textOrSymbolic":"Symbolic entry only"}'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: Then I see the "Maple" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: When I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: Then I see the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: When I enter "sinh" in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: Then I do not see the expression "sinh" highlighted in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: When I remove all text in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: And I enter "asin" in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: Then I see the expression "asin" highlighted in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Maple syntax
